pkgmetadata.longdescription: Methods for Closed Testing with Simes Inequality, in Particular Hommel's Method // Provides methods for closed testing using Simes local tests. In particular, calculates adjusted p-values for Hommel's multiple testing method, and provides lower confidence bounds for true discovery proportions. A robust but more conservative variant of the closed testing procedure that does not require the assumption of Simes inequality is also implemented.
